files.patch:
@@ -123,0 +123,3 @@
+            test("criuengine", "help,keep_running=true", 1,
+                    "unknown configure option: help",
+                    "CRaC engine failed to configure: 'help' = ''");
@@ -156,0 +159,11 @@
+
+        if (Platform.isLinux()) {
+            test("criuengine",
+                    Arrays.asList("help", "args=-v4"),
+                    1,
+                    Arrays.asList(
+                        "unknown configure option: help",
+                        "CRaC engine failed to configure: 'help' = ''"
+                    ),
+                    Collections.emptyList());
+        }
